Name: 对齐相机移动
Description: 【实现输入前后左右移动以相机为坐标轴】Comp 挂载CharacterController Input 配置 Player/Motion

Name: 输入旋转
Description: 【实现输入右键地面实现光标显示隐藏与角色旋转】Comp 挂载 CharacterController UI_Fight Comp 挂载 Cursor RectTran 检测地面层级 Floor Input 配置 Player/MouseRightPress

Name: 输入射击
Description: 【实现输入左键在实体的Muzzle位置生成Bullet弹药】Comp挂载 Muzzle Input 配置 Player/MouseLeft Loader 物体 Obj/Resource/Obj_Bullet

Name: 输入近战
Description: 【实现输入空格播放近战时间轴事件】Input 配置 Player/Space Comp 挂载 <Timeline> CloseFightTimelineAsset Comp 挂载 <PlayableDirector> PlayableDirector

Name: 跟随玩家
Description: 【实现跟随类型为主玩家的挂载Body】ObjType.MainPlayer Comp 挂载 Body

Name: 播放开始时间轴
Description: 【播放开始时间轴事件】Comp 挂载 <PlayableDirector> PlayableDirector

Name: 自动跟随鼠标旋转
Description: 【实现根据当前的鼠标检测到地面的位置实现偏移】Comp 挂载 <CharacterController> CharacterController Comp 挂载 <Transform> Point//计算旋转偏移 UI_Fight Comp 挂载 Cursor RectTran 检测地面层级 Floor

Name: 重力
Description: 【实现重力】Comp 挂载 <CharacterController> CharacterController 检测地面层级 Floor

Name: 输入冲刺
Description: 【实现输入空格播放传送时间轴事件】Input 配置 Player/Space Comp 挂载 <Timeline> TeleportTimelineAsset Comp 挂载 <PlayableDirector> PlayableDirector
